execution_quality: No tools were invoked; the agent provided a conversational response without taking action on the migration request.
work_category: Conversational comparison question about module systems (ESM vs CommonJS) with implicit request to migrate codebase.
summary: Agent answered a theoretical comparison question but failed to recognize the user's implicit intent to begin a migration. The follow-up message revealed the user had already decided on ESM, suggesting the agent should have offered to help with the migration rather than just explaining trade-offs.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately requested migration to ESM, indicating the comparison wasn't the real goal—the decision was already made.
